description: Notice of Proposed ProcurementREQ166663 / GrayKey various software licenses for Shared Services Canada
full_summary:
### GrayKey Software Licenses
#### Solicitation Number
 **Solicitation #:** SSC-24-00026518
**Publication Date:** May 15, 2024
**Closing Date:** May 27, 2024, at 11:00 AM

#### Background and Scope
Shared Services Canada announces a procurement for various GrayKey software licenses. The intent is to procure licenses under a contract which will be awarded based on a competitive process. The requirement is to acquire software licenses for different GrayKey products.

#### Procurement Details
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Atlantic Procurement Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA).

#### Tender Requirements
- Respondents must submit their bid electronically to the Contracting Authority.
- All questions should be directed to the Contracting Authority via email, with a requirement that respondents want to be certain of receiving a reply must submit all questions to the Contracting Authority.
- Responses may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Address for Bids
90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0C3

#### Contact Information
Geoffrey Lalor, Contracting Authority
Email: [geoffrey.lalor@canada.ca](mailto:geoffrey.lalor@canada.ca)
Phone: 613-462-2730
Fax: 000-000-0000

#### Important Notes
- The deadline for bids is strict, and late bids may not be accepted.
- All bid submissions should include the Solicitation # and a clear reference to the procurement.
- SSC reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Attachments
- Please refer to the publicly available documents on the [Shared Services Canada](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) website.

#### Contact Details
Technical documentation and other details about this Request for Proposal (RFP) are available on the Shared Services
